original_text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him, because he not only had broken the sabbath, but said also that God was his Father, making himself equal with God.
korean_text: 유대인들이 이로 말미암아 더욱 예수를 죽이고자 하니 이는 안식일을 범할 뿐만 아니라 하나님을 자기의 친 아버지라 하여 자기를 하나님과 동등으로 삼으심이러라

sentences.original_text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 유대인들이 더욱 그를 죽이려고 힘썼다

sentences.original_text: because he not only had broken the sabbath
but said also that God was his Father
